name: Age Archives: 20th Box Edition
summary:
Including the Bonus Story from Kimi ga Nozomu Eien ~Latest Edition~ named "Kanashimi wa Kaze no you ni" & 4 Bonus Titles.
Contains Vocal & Soundtrack CDs, 20th Anniversary Celebration Illustration Art, Fan Club Newsletter, Title Booklet & Sticker Set.

Age Maniax ~Isumi Yon Shimai Saigo no Hi~, Anonymous, Kaseki no Uta, Kimi ga Ita, Kisetsu ~Primary~, Kimi ga Nozomu Eien, Kimi ga Nozomu Eien Another Episode –, Kanashimi wa Kaze no Youni, Kimi ga Nozomu Eien ~Special Fan Disc~, Muv-Luv, Muv-Luv Altered Fable, Muv-Luv Alternative, Muv-Luv Alternative – Total Eclipse, Muv-Luv Alternative Chronicles Vol.1, Muv-Luv Alternative Chronicles Vol.2, Muv-Luv Alternative Chronicles Vol.3, Muv-Luv Alternative Chronicles Vol.4, Muv-Luv Photonflowers*, Owarinaki Natsu, Towa Naru Shirabe, Pikopiko ~Koisuru Kimochi no Nemuru Basho~, Rasen Kairou, Rasen Kairou 2, Schwarzesmarken and Shapeshifter.
